page.title: 07Wareham Employment.Continued
page.content:
Most people need good qualifications even for the simplist of jobs unfortunatly many people have not got these.School leavers usually don't do too bad in Dorset.Most either get apprenticeships,Youth Training Schemes or jobs at Winthrith Atomic power station.
Andrews Plant Hire employ 35 in their business.Employees are aged from 17 to 50,there being one school leaver.They hire out equipment from low loaders to large JCB diggers.Main trade is local but they do extend West to Weymouth, East to Southampton.RBS Brooklyns make stone and concrete products for gas and water services,walls and paving. They use local sand and gravel from Worgret.60 employed aged from 21 to 65.Only one school leaver.
